content: Six Pack disbanded and years later, Cable formed a new team, the X-Force. Bridge, now member of the S.H.I.E.L.D., formed the Weapon P.R.I.M.E. to investigate X-Force. The two teams starded a battle and Weapon P.R.I.M.E was defeated.
significantissues: Left Six Pack again, arrested (Cable & Deadpool #34, 2007)
